reviews.review:
As someone who generally doesn't really like Counter Strike, i had some fun with Condition Zero's single player. You recruit your team based on the points you earn and then basically play a Counter Strike bot match with some additional challenges you have to complete. The AI isn't the smartest and your ability to issue commands to your team is fairly limited but overall it's still a enjoyable experience. I have not tried the multiplayer, but it seems to be Counter Strike with some additional weapons and gadgets.



The real "fun" however hides itself in the Deleted Scenes. There you get a weird mix of short, kinda over the top story missions played on some of the most confusing maps i have ever seen. It is pretty much a given that you will find a spot per mission where you will just wander around trying to find a way to progress. Some random computer you have to activate to open a door, going along a small path by jumping over a balcony, having to go back to where you came from without a clear indication to do so, jumping on a barrel to get over a fence that doesn't look like your supposed to get over and so on. Your ammo is very limited, resulting in a few situations where your just running at the enemies with a knife in your hand, hoping to survive. The enemy AI is pretty much nonexistent , they either stand around not reacting to gunfire right next to them or just run straight at you. To top all of that off there is also pretty much no delay for them to start firing at you, causing such fun situations where you go around a corner just to be immediately shot by a sniper or rpg. Going through a mission without running low on ammo and health seems almost impossible.

But somehow the absurdity of playing a Valve published Counter Strike single player with such bad game design makes this whole experience kinda enjoyable, at least when you bought that game cheap on sale.
Top, ojalá hiciesen otro modo campaña con el csgo

[b]这主要是一个CS:CZ任务模式评测，Deleted Scenes[/b]

再一次通关，满满的回忆，想起自己初中暑假和朋友联机到凌晨一点多、光盘安装中途要换碟等等。
不过好像没注意到哪些是Deleted Scenes。
和半条命同风格的少量解谜、跑酷元素，不注意观察的话收集不到某些物资，甚至直接卡关。
结尾的滚动鸣谢蛮有意思，音乐也好听。

另外对战模式的队伍集结玩法和一些老地图、CZ地图真的很经典，让人怀念。
çok mükemmel bir oyun bunu sevmeyenin allah belasını versin tşkler ananızı sikim

One of the best bot difficulty in the CS franchise and ability to choose bot type based on skill and weapon is still unparalleled.

yoooo so lemme tell you guys a story. so theres this guy, right? his name is surf. dude is fucking crazy at movement and bunnyhopping, im not talkin about zuhn type shit, fuck that guy. im talking REAL big dick stuff. not your average silo jump on old nuke stuff. so anyway, this dude, surf. he's just really cool man. what can i say! so one day he hops on cs with me. and then he tells me about this other counter strike game. called "counter strike: condition zero". at first i was like "what? theres only one counter strike game, counter strike: global offensive of course!" and he was like "no man, you need to try out this new counter strike game. its real, and its called counter-strike: condition zero." so i buy the game for the amazing price of $0.99 (plus tax) and i was blown away....LUSH, ORGANIC, ENVIRONMENTS. COMPLETE 3D PLAYERMODELS AND MAPS. HD TEXTURES!!?!?!!1!?1! i had never seen anything like it in my entire life. such a breathtaking game. all thanks to my good friend and skilled bunnyhopping/movement devotee: surf. i am forever thankful for his presence and if it weren't for him, i wouldn't be here writing a review for my favorite game....counter-strike: condition zero. thank you surf.
Verry legendary game ! buy it ! no regret at all

A different way to experience Counter Strike, it's a must get if you love CS
Purchasing this game gives your two diferent games:


CS:Condition Zero : 
This game is purely just tours of duty throught the cs maps, makeovers and new maps. playing versus diferent variety of bot levels and assembling your own team

CS:Condition Zero Deleted Scenes: 
The real deal, this is the game you see in the pictures of the store page, you get to play counter-terrorist missions all over the earth

It's a damn shame there will never be a proper remake or some sort of sequel to this, because CZ (Condition Zero had a lot of potential to introduce new things, but it just got swept under the rug like so many others.

Что я могу сказать об этой игре? Я купил ее потому что она шла в комплекте с CS 1.6 в своё время. И за всё это время я наиграл в ней огромное количество часов, а именно 0.2 ч. Поэтому я могу с уверенностью сказать, что эта игра просто топчик. Затягивает буквально с первого момента. Вы будете залипать в нее пока на ваш дом не упадет метеорит или что-то в таком духе. Оторваться уже невозможно ... В общем игруха огонь !!!

РЕКОМЕНДУЮ !!!
